TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content:
Beale, I tried to wrench myself away from your Russian-centric mod and do some NASA stuff, but where did I find myself?

Strolling up to this station, of course.

Absolutely stellar (no pun intended, OK, maybe a little) work. Just fantastic. Thanks for everything.
Can we have a quick sneak peek at some of the stuff you are planning to make Beale? (Personally, I wold love to see the PPTS!)

I replaced the old Tantares models on my ISS with the new ones. They look great. Thank you for the remodel, Beale!

Javascript is disabled. View full album

I've added part of the Russian segment based on @curtquarquesso's design.

There's a farshot Soyuz and a couple of Progresses attached. I've been using them as tugs to get all the parts in place.

Beale, I tried to wrench myself away from your Russian-centric mod and do some NASA stuff, but where did I find myself?

Strolling up to this station, of course.

http://i.imgur.com/1UuSchD.png

Absolutely stellar (no pun intended, OK, maybe a little) work. Just fantastic. Thanks for everything.

No.

In fact, I am 99% sure this is an alt account for a certain user that has been on my ignore list for a while.

Apologies if this is not true, but patterns of typing are rarely this similar.

I replaced the old Tantares models on my ISS with the new ones. They look great. Thank you for the remodel, Beale!

http://imgur.com/a/sgNWn

I've added part of the Russian segment based on @curtquarquesso's design.

There's a farshot Soyuz and a couple of Progresses attached. I've been using them as tugs to get all the parts in place.

Wow!

That's really pretty!

Far more complex than anything I've ever built. Was this a complete new build or some editing magic with the previous station?

Something, something Parom space tug...

Pip pip!

I really love the angled nozzles.

Edited June 2, 2015 by Beale

Beale, I have to say after playing ksp for a year now with mods the whole time, Tantares is the one mod I keep coming back to. Everything about this mod is great and keep getting better, right down to how well it compliments stock imo.

Keep up the good work!

Is the texture on the Mianbao having issues in the new soyuz update, or is it a problem on my end?

Also - Cannot tell you how happy I am about the new docking light part.

I've literally been waiting since the first Tantares release I found for that!

Pip pip!

I really love the angled nozzles.

Is... Is that the Titan II?

Well, it's a hell of a lot better than my models!

Is... Is that the Titan II?

Well, it's a hell of a lot better than my models!

Titan II nozzles were straight, may be H-IIB?

Is... Is that the Titan II?

Well, it's a hell of a lot better than my models!

It's the British rocket whose name I can't remember for the life of me.

Titan II nozzles were straight, may be H-IIB?
It's the British rocket whose name I can't remember for the life of me.

The engines did seem wrong for the Titan II, but I thought that maybe he made them like that so they would be more compatible with other parts of something.

If it isn't Titan II, I don't know what it is. Maybe Beale will enlighten us come morning.

Ooooo! Really Digging that New Blue Streak Rocket (Or At least I think it's the Blue Streak, I'm honestly not too sure, :/ )

Edited June 3, 2015 by LordLemonFaceOfLemonistan

Ooooo! Really Digging that New Black Arrow (Or At least I think it's the Black Arrow Rocket, It could be the Black Knight I'm honestly not too sure)

Looks like the British Blue Streak MRBM, which became the first stage of Europa! Woof! I do hope we get Black Arrow and Black Knight.

Also I love the bluestreak. I was trying to make one some time ago as my first mod, but it fell apart due to computer troubles. It's nice to see it finally get some justice.

Tantares Craft Files v2.1 is up! Link is in my signature.

To kick it off, I recorded a demo of the new Venera 9 craft file.

Some of the new craft include:

Gemini and Agena Target Vehicle (No lifter yet, can't find one I like) (Inspired by the LIFE magazine hanging on my wall.)

Sputnik 1 (Fairing system is really historically accurate.)

ISS Zarya and Zvezda (Just finishing up Pirs and Poisk now)

Almost every craft got touched or refined in some way. The biggest change was making almost all ports 0.9375m, and making craft generally less dependent on my TweakScale config so they're not as borked for people who don't want to use them. Progress vehicles were removed pending Beale's Progress revamp at some point. N1 was broken by update 28, so I'm going to need to downgrade and salvage it.

More images can be found in a new album for v2.1 in the original post in my signature.

Enjoy!

Tantares Craft Files v2.1 is up! Link is in my signature.

To kick it off, I recorded a demo of the new Venera 9 craft file.

Some of the new craft include:

Gemini and Agena Target Vehicle (No lifter yet, can't find one I like) (Inspired by the LIFE magazine hanging on my wall.)

http://i.imgur.com/5HZ9lIj.png

http://i.imgur.com/ncH7Te0.png

Sputnik 1 (Fairing system is really historically accurate.)

http://i.imgur.com/OJDNgki.png

http://i.imgur.com/CxGZf0C.png

ISS Zarya and Zvezda (Just finishing up Pirs and Poisk now)

http://i.imgur.com/DTfTJGx.png

Almost every craft got touched or refined in some way. The biggest change was making almost all ports 0.9375m, and making craft generally less dependent on my TweakScale config so they're not as borked for people who don't want to use them. Progress vehicles were removed pending Beale's Progress revamp at some point. N1 was broken by update 28, so I'm going to need to downgrade and salvage it.

More images can be found in a new album for v2.1 in the original post in my signature.

Enjoy!

Wow!

Beautiful stuff, many thanks!

Edited June 3, 2015 by Beale

It's the Black Knight!

Which is a continuation of the Blue Streak.

Black Knight was not derived from Blue Streak. In fact, it was designed to test and verify the Blue Streak reentry vehicle. The rocket engines you are portraying appear to be the RZ2 rocket engines, not the four-chamber Gamma rocket engine used on Black Knight, or the eight-chamber Gamma used on Black Arrow.

Black Knight was not derived from Blue Streak. In fact, it was designed to test and verify the Blue Streak reentry vehicle. The engines you are portraying appear to be the RZ2 rocket engines, not the four-chamber Gamma rocket engine used on Black Knight, or the eight-chamber Gamma used on Black Arrow.

Anyway, I will probably fly a Gemini 4 mission this afternoon. If you want some good pictures of Gemini, I can supply then.
